snippet: Some longtime fans of the University of Montana Grizzlies are wrestling with their feelings in the wake of a series of allegations of sexual assaults by football players.
abstract: Missoula Journal; some longtime fans of the University of Montana football team are wrestling with their loyalty in the wake of a series of allegations of sexual assault by team members, most of which appear to have gone unreported or minimized; two starting players have been charged with rape in connection with a 2010 episode, and are represented by lawyers who continue to hold positions as board members of the Grizzly booster organization.
lead_paragraph: Some longtime fans of the University of Montana Grizzlies are wrestling with their feelings in the wake of a series of allegations of sexual assaults by football players.

headline.seo: Sex Charges Cast a Pall on a Montana College Town
headline.main: Sex Charges Cast a Pall on a College Town
headline.print_headline: Sex Charges Cast a Pall On a College Town
